de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.gdbscan

Class PreDeConNeighborPredicate<V extends NumberVector>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.gdbscan.AbstractRangeQueryNeighborPredicate<V,PreDeConNeighborPredicate.PreDeConModel>
      • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.gdbscan.PreDeConNeighborPredicate<V>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - the type of NumberVector handled by this Algorithm
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    NeighborPredicate

    @Reference(authors="C. B\u00f6hm, K. Kailing, H.-P. Kriegel, P. Kr\u00f6ger",
           title="Density Connected Clustering with Local Subspace Preferences",
           booktitle="Proc. 4th IEEE Int. Conf. on Data Mining (ICDM\'04), Brighton, UK, 2004",
           url="http://dx.doi.org/10.1109/ICDM.2004.10087")
public class PreDeConNeighborPredicate<V extends NumberVector>
extends AbstractRangeQueryNeighborPredicate<V,PreDeConNeighborPredicate.PreDeConModel>
    Neighborhood predicate used by PreDeCon. Reference:

    C. Böhm, K. Kailing, H.-P. Kriegel, P. Kröger:
    Density Connected Clustering with Local Subspace Preferences.
    In Proc. 4th IEEE Int. Conf. on Data Mining (ICDM'04), Brighton, UK, 2004.

    Author:
    Peer Kröger, Erich Schubert
